events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and I'd like a refund.
System has categorized the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning an item.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria S. who specializes in refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket to proceed with the refund?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still has all tags attached as I received it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately after we receive the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on the return process.
We have received your returned jacket and processed a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days to see the amount reflected.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been processed and you confirmed no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your recent support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
